intro: Psychotria yabaensis, commonly known as Yabaense Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Colombia and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its slender, scandent stems and opposite, ovate leaves with a glossy surface. It produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale green, followed by small, dark blue-black berries. Psychotria yabaensis is often found in humid, shaded environments such as cloud forests.
